page.title: 09PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: We have a small playground with hopscotch sqares and a netball pitch marked on it. We have to stay on it in Winter but in Summer we can use the field. The games played are hopscotch , British bulldog , catch , skipping , marbles , stuck in the mud , racing toy cars and tennis . It is hard not to knock little people over in Winter but the field has lots of room to run and shout and make dens. When the men have cut the grass we make nests with all the grass. The boys have soldiers and tanks and space toys but we have Barbie dolls , Little Ponies and care bears. Tennis is very popular at the moment because of Wimbledon and we use plastic racquets and sponge balls that go on the roof. In marbles we play HITSIES and POTSIES . In hitsies you have to hit someone else's marble but in potsies you ain for a tiny hole.
